body: Supported on Windows only currently, but we'll have that P Invoke soon and so this hunk can be reversed.   this didn't require a p invoke, unless I read it wrong.  VSO create date - 9/1/2015 14:37:00     VSO closed date - 10/9/2015 12:52:00
